definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to infringe the rights of/to violate/infringement
to abstain from voting/to forfeit/to waive one's right to vote/to abdicate

sentences.english: Hages Andover's option to buying this property is gonna expire by the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 银行对于这处房产的购置权月底就要失效了。

sentences.english: The family home has been foreclosed.
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子丧失了抵押赎回权。

sentences.english: Chapter Two researches on the exertion of subrogation right of marine insurance.
sentences.chinese: 第二章探讨海上保险代位求偿权的行使。

sentences.english: The takings clause mediates between the police power and the eminent domain power.
sentences.chinese: 征收条款是在警察权有偿取得财产权的调和。

sentences.english: Trinity General Insurance Company Limited reserves the final right of approval.
sentences.chinese: 三联保险有限公司保留保单的最后批核权。

sentences.english: The treatise discusses the nature of leasehold.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论的是租赁权的性质问题。

sentences.english: She manoeuvred her friends into positions of power.
sentences.chinese: 她设法使她的朋友们掌了权。

sentences.english: It is an important part of public prosecution power .
sentences.chinese: 公诉变更是公诉权的一项重要权能。

sentences.english: Chapter 1 is about the basic theory of neighboring right.
sentences.chinese: 第一章相邻权的基本理论。

sentences.english: In another word, the range of relating right shall not be unreasonably extended.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，邻接权的范围不得被不合理的扩大。

sentences.english: The reward shall not exceed the value of the ship and other property salved .
sentences.chinese: 本条规定不影响船舶所有人对其他被救助方的追偿权。

sentences.english: The establishment of visitation right system is a big step forward in marriage and family legislation in our country.
sentences.chinese: 探望权制度的确立，是我国婚姻家庭立法上一大进步。

sentences.english: In the second chapter I analyzed the realistic basis and the jurisprudence basis on generation and development of environmental right .
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析环境权产生和发展的现实基础和法理基础。

sentences.english: Applicable to application for Stock Exchange Trading Right only.
sentences.chinese: 只适用于聯交所交易权申请。

sentences.english: Brand seems like a kind of immoderate murder which entrepreneurs conduct to the consumers' thinking rights.
sentences.chinese: 品牌是企业主对消费者思考权的一种超限谋杀。

sentences.english: He renounces his claim to the money.
sentences.chinese: 他放弃了对那笔钱的要求权。

definition: right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
ability to make one's own decisions
to have no right/to have no authority
ability to have one's say and be listened to/influence/clout
initiative (as in "seize the initiative")/advantageous position that allows one to call the shots
